title: Wangscape options schema
description: Specifies how Wangscape should convert a set of terrain tiles into corner Wang tilesets.

MetaOutput.title: Meta-output information schema
MetaOutput.description: Specifies the filenames Wangscape will use to write meta-output.

TileData.title: Tile data filename
TileData.description: Specifies the file which will contain individual details about each output tile.

TileGroups.title: Tile groups filename
TileGroups.description: Specifies the file which will contain grouped arrays of details for similar tiles.

TilesetData.title: Tileset data filename
TilesetData.description: Specifies the file which will contain details about output tilesets.

TerrainHypergraph.title: Terrain hypergraph filename
TerrainHypergraph.description: Specifies the file which will contain the hypergraph of terrains which can appear in the same tile.

TileFormat.title: Tile format schema
TileFormat.description: Specifies the format of Wangscape's input and output tiles.

Resolution.title: Tile resolution
Resolution.description: Specifies the width and height of the square tiles Wangscape will operate on.

FileType.title: File type schema
FileType.description: Specifies the file type of Wangscape's output tiles.

OutputDirectory.title: Output directory schema.
OutputDirectory.description: Specifies the directory where Wangscape should write the output tiles (may be wiped first!)

Terrains.title: Terrains schema
Terrains.description: Specifies the names and textures of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.

^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+$.title: Terrain schema
^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+$.description: Specifies the name and texture of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.

FullName.title: Full name schema
FullName.description: Specifies the full name of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles.

FileName.title: File name schema
FileName.description: Specifies the file in which the texture of one of Wangscape's input terrain tiles can be found.

OffsetX.title: X offset schema
OffsetX.description: Specifies the horizontal offset of the terrain tile's texture in the input image, divided by the tile resolution.

OffsetY.title: Y offset schema
OffsetY.description: Specifies the vertical offset of the terrain tile's texture in the input image, divided by the tile resolution.

Cliques.title: Cliques schema
Cliques.description: Specifies terrain type sets for which corner Wang tilesets will be generated.

items.title: Clique schema
items.description: Specifies a set of 2-4 terrain types for which a corner Wang tileset will be generated.

items.title: Clique item schema
items.description: Specifies a terrain type by its key in the Terrains property.

AlphaCalculatorMode.title: AlphaCalculatorMode schema
AlphaCalculatorMode.description: Specifies which type of AlphaCalculator should be used to convert corner weights into alpha values.

AlphaCalculatorTopTwoPower.title: AlphaCalculatorTopTwoPower schema
AlphaCalculatorTopTwoPower.description: Specifies an exponent to which noise values should be raised before applying TopTwo or related alpha calculators.

DefaultModuleGroup.title: DefaultModuleGroup schema
DefaultModuleGroup.description: Optionally specifies the location of a JSON file containing a default module group to use for tile centres and borders which don't have a module group specified in CentralModuleGroups, LeftBorderModuleGroups, or RightBorderModuleGroups.

LeftBorderModuleGroups.title: LeftBorderModuleGroup schema
LeftBorderModuleGroups.description: Specifies the locations of JSON files containing module groups to use to weight the left side of horizontal borders in tile generation.

items.title: BorderModuleGroup item schema
items.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrains and the location of a JSON file containing the module group which should be used for borders connecting them.

Terrains.title: BorderModuleGroups Terrains schema
Terrains.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrains for which the module group should be used

elements.title: BorderModuleGroups terrain schema
elements.description: Specifies a terrain by its key in the Terrains property.

Filename.title: BorderModuleGroup Filename schema
Filename.description: Specifies the location of the JSON file containing the module group for use on borders with this pair of terrains.

TopBorderModuleGroups.title: TopBorderModuleGroup schema
TopBorderModuleGroups.description: Specifies the locations of JSON files containing module groups to use to weight the top side of vertical borders in tile generation.

items.title: BorderModuleGroup item schema
items.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrains and the location of a JSON file containing the module group which should be used for borders connecting them.

Terrains.title: BorderModuleGroups Terrains schema
Terrains.description: Specifies an ordered pair of terrains for which the module group should be used

elements.title: BorderModuleGroups terrain schema
elements.description: Specifies a terrain by its key in the Terrains property.

Filename.title: BorderModuleGroup Filename schema
Filename.description: Specifies the location of the JSON file containing the module group for use on borders with this pair of terrains.

CentralModuleGroups.title: CentralModuleGroups schema
CentralModuleGroups.description: Specifies the locations of JSON files containing module groups to use in the centre of generated tile partitions.

items.title: CentralModuleGroups item schema
items.description: Specifies a terrain and the location of a JSON file containing the module group which should be used for the central weight of corner masks associated with that terrain.

Terrain.title: CentralModuleGroups terrain schema
Terrain.description: Specifies a terrain by its key in the Terrains property.

Filename.title: CentralModuleGroups Filename schema
Filename.description: Specifies the location of the JSON file containing the module group for use in tile centres with this terrain.

CombinerModuleGroup.title: CombinerModuleGroup filename schema
CombinerModuleGroup.description: Specifies the location of the JSON file containing the module group to use to combine border and central module groups into the corner masks used to generate tiles.

DebugOutput.title: DebugOutput schema
DebugOutput.description: Specifies whether Wangscape should write debug data during tile generation.

DebugTileResolution.title: DebugTileResolution schema
DebugTileResolution.description: Specifies the resolution of the images written as debug data during tile generation.
